title: Missing untriaged label
body:
Bug reports that get moved to MSBuild via mover software don't automatically receive MSBuild labels like untriaged, which means they can easily fall through the cracks.

Example:
https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/issues/26711

nodes.body:
Tried looking into this, but it doesn't look supported in fabric bot today.

In the meantime, our best bet is either [a search for unlabeled issues](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+no%3Alabel), or a [search for unlabeled issues, sorted by last-updated](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+no%3Alabel+sort%3Aupdated-desc)
